mapper.select: SELECT gs.GOODS_NO, gs.GOODS_CATEGORY, gs.GOODS_NAME, gs.GOODS_CONTENT, gs.GOODS_ORIGIN_PRICE, gs.GOODS_SELL_PRICE, gs.GOODS_SALE_PRICE, gs.GOODS_DATE, gs.GOODS_KEYWORD, gs.GOODS_READCNT, up.UPLOAD_SAVE_NAME FROM goods gs ,upload up WHERE gs.GOODS_NO = up.GOODS_NO ORDER BY GOODS_DATE desc
